resources.string: Meow World!- A cat will amost never "meow" at another cat. This sound is reserved for humans. There are more than 500 million domestic cats in the world, with 33 different breeds An average cat has 1-8 kittens per litter, and 2-3 litters per year.2 to 24 kitten per year People who own pets live longer, have less stress, and have fewer heart attacks.(Source:http://www.fourpawsandtailrescue.org/) Ask your mom for a cat or a dog today!
